metadata.title: CVE-2018-18820 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A buffer overflow was discovered in the URL-authentication backend of theIcecast before 2.4.4. If the backend is enabled, then any malicious HTTPclient can send a request for that specific resource including a craftedheader, leading to denial of service and potentially remote code execution.

criterions.comment: icecast2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
